@graph.name: Lao Crispy Rice Salad (Nam Khao) - Pups with Chopsticks
@graph.description: A crispy rice Lao salad with crispy, chewy rice balls and a balance of sweet, tart, salty and spiciness flavours and fresh herbs.

@graph.name: Lao Crispy Rice Salad (Nam Khao)
@graph.description: A Lao crispy rice salad (Nam Khao) with crispy, chewy textures with a balance of sweet, tart, salty and spiciness.
recipeIngredient: 3 cups sticky glutinous rice ((also called sweet sticky rice. soaked a minimum of 4 hours))
shallots ((sliced and soaked in cold water to remove the raw bite))

itemListElement.text: Soak the sticky rice for a minimum of 4 hours. Drain water
itemListElement.name: Soak the sticky rice for a minimum of 4 hours. Drain water

itemListElement.text: In a pot, bring water to a boil and pour the rice into a colander and set on top of the pot. Put the lid on and steam for 15 mins.
itemListElement.name: In a pot, bring water to a boil and pour the rice into a colander and set on top of the pot. Put the lid on and steam for 15 mins.

itemListElement.text: After 15 minutes, turn the rice over in the colander so the other side can be steamed for 15 minutes. Steam rice until it is translucent. (Be careful, the colander is very hot!)
itemListElement.name: After 15 minutes, turn the rice over in the colander so the other side can be steamed for 15 minutes. Steam rice until it is translucent. (Be careful, the colander is very hot!)

itemListElement.text: Remove rice from the pot, put it into a bowl and cover with a towel for 15-30 minutes until warm and sticky.
itemListElement.name: Remove rice from the pot, put it into a bowl and cover with a towel for 15-30 minutes until warm and sticky.

itemListElement.text: Add in the curry paste, lime leaves, garlic, shallot, sugar, fish sauce and egg and mix well.
itemListElement.name: Add in the curry paste, lime leaves, garlic, shallot, sugar, fish sauce and egg and mix well.

itemListElement.text: Set deep fryer to 350F (176C), or medium heat on a pot of oil on the stove.
itemListElement.name: Set deep fryer to 350F (176C), or medium heat on a pot of oil on the stove.

itemListElement.text: Create rice balls or oval patties with the rice mix. (Oil your hands so they don't stick to your hands)
itemListElement.name: Create rice balls or oval patties with the rice mix. (Oil your hands so they don't stick to your hands)

itemListElement.text: Deep fry them for 3 minutes or until golden brown.
itemListElement.name: Deep fry them for 3 minutes or until golden brown.

itemListElement.text: Combine the sugar and the hot water first to melt it evenly into the water.
itemListElement.name: Combine the sugar and the hot water first to melt it evenly into the water.

itemListElement.text: Then add the remainder of the ingredients and put it in the fridge to cool
itemListElement.name: Then add the remainder of the ingredients and put it in the fridge to cool

itemListElement.text: Break up the rice balls and som moo and put into a bowl
itemListElement.name: Break up the rice balls and som moo and put into a bowl

itemListElement.text: Add in the toppings and dressing and mix well
itemListElement.name: Add in the toppings and dressing and mix well

itemListElement.text: Eat with a spoon or wrapped in lettuce :)
itemListElement.name: Eat with a spoon or wrapped in lettuce :)

@graph.keywords: crispy rice recipe, crispy rice salad, lao food, nam khao
